embeds.title: Guide to Card Master
embeds.description: Card Master <:eventcard:909986289535832104> is a __7-day__ event where a player can participate to get hero shards.

fields.name: Rules
value<text>: • Players can play up to __25__ rounds of card flipping
• Each round has a set of 9 cards. The player first shuffles the cards and then flips the card one-by-one.
• The player can end a round at any time.
• After ending a round, the player can start a new round (for the same or a different hero).
• The player can get bonus rewards for the total number of flips.
• The first flip costs 300 gems, and subsequent flips cost 600 gems each. (**5100** gems for 9 flips).

fields.name: Best strategy
value<text>: • End your round when you get the hero shard.
• Do __NOT__ do rounds with single or double flips. If you need a small number of shards, it is more economic to play Wheel of Fortune and exchange for shards in the Trading Hall.
• Don't start a round if you don't have 5100 gems for the worst-case scenario (9 flips).
• Statistically, doing 20 rounds of card flipping is the most economic. You will need about 56 400 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>.
